dialogs.name: LILIA
dialogs.sentenses: Oh! My head! What happened here?

dialogs.name: ZIA
dialogs.sentenses: Sister! You woke up, let's go, we have to get out of here later I'll explain.

dialogs.name: ZIA
dialogs.sentenses: You were kidnapped or whatever that crazy Dr Flávio was trying to do to you.

dialogs.name: LILIA
dialogs.sentenses: You are crazy! What would Doctor Flávio want with me? And what would he be doing here?

dialogs.name: ZIA
dialogs.sentenses: That actually wasn't even his name, apparently he was a maniac. He was saying something about an ancient water goddess and something about sacrifice.

dialogs.name: LILIA
dialogs.sentenses: Sacrifice? My God! Was I going to be sacrificed?!

dialogs.name: ZIA
dialogs.sentenses: I think so, but we saved you! Well, let's get out of here before he comes back.

dialogs.name: ZIA
dialogs.sentenses: There was a bird helping me, but there was a flash and it disappeared.

dialogs.name: LILIA
dialogs.sentenses: Just look at your size! I'm just a weak girl.

dialogs.name: LILIA
dialogs.sentenses: You fought for me, you saved me once again. Like that time that woman wanted to hit me.

dialogs.name: ZIA
dialogs.sentenses: Well, you could listen to me more and learn to defend yourself, wouldn't you?

dialogs.name: LILIA
dialogs.sentenses: You're right, if I knew how to defend myself none of this would have happened.

dialogs.name: LILIA
dialogs.sentenses: Come on Zia, let's get out of here. Something tells me we should head towards the city fountain.
